title: Add Admin Dashboard link to mobile navigation menu

requirements.text: Add the Admin Dashboard navigation link to the mobile menu in the Layout component so it appears when users open the hamburger menu on mobile devices

quotes: You can see iam not getting Admin dashboard option

acceptanceCriteria: Admin Dashboard link appears in the mobile menu alongside Home, Submit AC, Pricing Info, and Contact links
Mobile menu displays all navigation options including Admin Dashboard when hamburger icon is clicked
Admin Dashboard link in mobile menu navigates to /admin route when clicked
Mobile menu closes after Admin Dashboard link is clicked

constraints: Do not modify the desktop navigation implementation - Admin Dashboard link already works there
Maintain the existing mobile menu structure and styling with the earth-tone color palette
Keep the conditional rendering logic that shows/hides Admin link based on authentication state
nonGoals: Changing the authentication flow or login system
Modifying the admin dashboard page functionality
Altering the desktop navigation menu structure
